comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: oz.kashi on January 16, 2023, 01:46:39 PMHello everyone.I would appreciate your help, which broker agent is considered the leading and safest today? Is anyone here active on a particular site and can give a recommendation?With cryptos you don't need a broker... you only need an exchange account or a wallet with a swap function like Atomic wallet. And this is the nice part of bitcoin and criptos, anyone can be his own broker and invest in whatever they feel is better. To take the best decisions for your investments just follow the recent news, that way you will get some hints about where to invest your money.

comments.author: Desmong
comments.body: I think op had mistaken the word exchange for broker. Broker is used for trading sites that allows traders to trading and earn through differences in price. Here in cryptocurrency, we don't use the word broker, instead we use exchanges fir a trading sites like Binance, and other similar trading websites. Maybe you have to change the word to exchanges or probably a casino if you intend gambling.

Remember, what you are looking for is all the internet, unwanted things can happen at any time, Using a broker agent can have an impact on your bets, as far as I know I haven't found a brokerage agent here who is really good to recommend, you should do direct betting yourself, don't easily trust third parties on the internet.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: I believe you are looking for a crypto-exchange, right?You posted the question in the wrong board though, this is gambling discussion, you should move it to trading discussion. As for the crypto exchange, there are a lot of factors one can consider before using it and each person sort of has a preferenceFactors like KYC and AML policy of the exchange, trading and withdrawal fees, transparency of the exchange, popularity of the exchange, the assets list on the exchange etcWith all those factors, one can not conclusively list for you your ultimate platform.
